p.d: With the ghost of Delphine, a sociétaire who committed suicide several months earlier, still hanging over the place, an unexplained series of backstage murders occurs at the Comédie-Française. Domont and his associate Strozzi investigate at this famous institution, where power plays and rivalries are the norm... Directed by: Claude Mouriéras (France, 2013) Screenplay: Claude Mouriéras, Jean-Luc Gaget Cast: Michel Aumont (Francis), Éric Ruf (Éric), Florence Viala (Clara), Denis Podalydes (Philippe), Laurent Stocker (Sébastien), Elsa Lepoivre (Delphine), Julie Sicard (Sophie), Hervé Pierre (Greg Brunet), Marie-Sophie Ferdane (Fabienne), Christian Hecq (Domont), Suliane Brahim (Strozzi) Genre: detective Awards: Best television film, La Rochelle TV Drama Festival 2013 Parental guidance: TV-PG
